properties.Description: After leaving work, Hans stops at the Christmas market and then assists the old Cathedral Pastor who is being threatened by dangerous men.

The story begins in December 1804, with young Hans Schumacher finishing work in a print shop. Hans and the print master discuss their special holiday edition of the Rhine Legends and Strasbourg's long printing history.
Continuing his walk home from work in the dark, Hans comes across a street of shops and finds 'Old Strasbourg', an antique shop. Out of the shadows, he comes face to face with death.

Hans attends a meeting of the Royal Guard, a secret society. The meeting hall is hidden within the historic Grande Boucherie building. There, Hans learns about the ancient origins of the Guardians of Strasbourg.
Hans returns home to the apartment where he lives with his mother, Anna. They live a quiet, peaceful life amongst friends and neighbors... until dark forces change their world.
The Officers' Quarters of the Citadel of Strasbourg. Here plans are being made by a treacherous Captain in an alliance with dark and scheming forces.
After meeting the shopkeeper of Old Strasbourg, Hans heads to the Christmas Market for sausages, mulled wine and gifts for family and friends.
